title: Gotoubun no Hanayome
description:
A wholesome story of five precious cinnamon rolls. 

Why you have to read this:
1. 4.5 million prints in 9 volumes. Nisekoi and To Love Ru are shaking.
2. The winner of Kondansha annual award 2019.
3. The art is glorious.
4. Always sparks very active discussions about the latest chapter. The banter and the waifu war are a lot of fun as well.
5. Lots of cute fanart.

What could go wrong?
footer: You can claim a free hug once you've caught up with the manga.
